attributes.comment:
With regard to the proposed increase of application fee for the I 600, I believe
that there SHOULD BE an increase of this fee, but only applicable when the bill
H.R. 628 is PASSED and set into place for any and all NEW applicants.

As we all know, the wait times have extended for China to over 17 months now.
Having the fees higher during this transition, is going to place an undo burdon on
almost all families during this long wait.

Please consider raising this fee for all NEW APPLICANTS ONLY not for those still
waiting for referrals from China, or after the new bill has passed the
House and Senate.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Dan Stenger
